alfredsnippet.snippet:
Wilfred Branfield, Continuous Creation, 1950, p.39

"Life, when properly understood, will be found to be a fundamental thing in the universe, being the manipulative agent that ties those knots in the ether concentrating radiant energy into nuclei of the kind that is designated as matter."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Life Fundamental to the Universe
